body: Bruh, the bitch in the first story is mad as hell.
雨衣一旦画了正常东西反而更让人觉得恐怖了，淦

conti- she realised her mistake and wanted to go back but husband denied her after they divorced she still kept bugging him sending him letters and marraige certificate. one day they encounter each other and she full yandere mode chace him he calls his lawyer and tells her to stay away according to the agreement. after that authorities took care of her. with that some disposition between mc and his parents he realise his parents didnt have good impression of his ex cos she used to spent his money recklessly and not doing house work and play around. mcs parents ask him why didnt he divorced her sooner mc tells them cos they taught him to never divorce but they didnt remember it. hence last meeting with lawyer the lawyer tells him that he is strong mentality to be able to endure this madness.

plot for first one- the woman and man met and they got into relationship which led them to get married the guy was too perfect and the girl was getting inferiority complex cos of this the guy was rich and did most of the house work. and the girl got pocket money to spent on expensive things. then cos of this she got lonely and distant from the mc she asked him to get a new apt for her but he denied(correct me if m wrong) later she stole 10 mill from his bank acc for renting apartment and having relation with other guys. cos the husband was to perfect for her she felt lonely and he felt out of her reach. then the husband discovers this all meets lawyer and lawyer said to get some proof. but still husband wanted to reconcile cos he felt he left her alone. but after he checked her phone she had msgs like"i dont wanna stay with him" and "i will leave him soon". the husband completely fell out of love and decided to divorce her. after he sent papers to her she realised her mistake.
